nodes.text: Zika was a male bounty hunter who lived during the Clone Wars, a galactic conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Around 20 BBY, Zika spent two days on Paklan following Darth Maul and Savage Opress to a diner. Zika told Toomey the location of the brothers, and received his payment before Toomey and the band of bounty hunters were killed.
